item.title: Astronomer board investigating CEO after Coldplay kiss-cam video
item.description: Tech company Astronomer said its board has launched an investigation after CEO Andy Byron was seen embracing a coworker at a Coldplay concert.

item.title: 10 Americans freed in prisoner swap between U.S., El Salvador, Venezuela
item.description: Ten Americans are en route to the U.S. after a prisoner swap involving the U.S., El Salvador and Venezuela, Secretary of State Marco Rubio said Friday...

item.title: CBS News poll: Most Americans favor U.S. returning to moon, going to Mars
item.description: Many think the space program adds to feelings of national pride and patriotism, a CBS News poll shows.

item.title: 7/15: CBS Morning News
item.description: President Trump threatens tariffs targeting Russia if there's no Ukraine peace deal in 50 days; Unreleased Beyonce music stolen from vehicle in Atlant...

item.title: 7/11: CBS Morning News
item.description: ICE raids at California cannabis farms turn violent; Fired Justice Department official warns of retribution inside agency.
